turns.text: Okay you got any hobbies that you want to talk about
turns.label: o

turns.text: Well I uh dont seem to have as much spare time as I used to but I guess Ill have to say my computer has probably taken the place of most of my hobbies
turns.label: sd

turns.text: What in the world do you do with your computer that takes so much time
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well I sit and design cards --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh really
turns.label: bh

turns.text: -- and uh oh I Im really into graphics so it it just I sit and learn new programs and I play and I do this and I do that and
turns.label: sd

turns.label: qy

turns.text: Im Im starting side business in desk top publishing --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.label: sd

-- and uh
turns.label: sd

turns.label: qw

turns.text: I teach business and computer technology
Oh thats good

turns.label: bd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh its its really challenge but What hobbies do you have

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Ooh neat
turns.label: ba

turns.text: And I uh like to do lot of bicycling when the weather allows and during summer when theres daylight savings times when I get out and bike
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well I hope you all had as pretty day today as we did
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well it wasnt too bad other than the Cowboys didnt do so hot
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh well now yes I dont think you can blame the weather on that We had -
turns.label: aa

turns.text: No just crummy well actually - the Lions are pretty good Im afraid they pro- lot better team than the Cowboys were today And uh -
turns.label: aa

turns.text: On any given day they say - Uh I havent I havent played in while but I do when I get time and its pretty weather and its summer I like to play golf
turns.label: o

turns.text: Oh okay I I play that about six times year and every year I hang my bag up if I get that five or six and I swear swear that game off for another year but I always go back to it
turns.label: bk

turns.text: Oh I uh oh I take spells Im Im kind of compulsive obsessive person and when I start something I I go into it thousand percent --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I understand that
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and then I get I get burned out on it But uh I do some counted cross-stitch and some painting on shirts
turns.label: sd

So you do quite bit of traveling then

turns.text: Well I usually - see we we have our our band practice is on Monday night and during the summer we uh we have concerts every Monday night in the park and uh we we have you know some concerts during the year and you know various people in the communities want us to play for things but those are usually on the weekend so that isnt too bad
turns.label: sd

turns.text: How big is your band
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well we got uh pretty good size band Not everybody shows up but if everyone did wed probably have over hundred but --
turns.label: sd

turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- we only average about forty to fifty people you know usually
Well thats still pretty bi- good size band
turns.label: bf

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Its not like there are four or five of you there
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh no no This is - its concert band and uh we have lot of - I I dont pretend to be that good but theres lot of people that uh you know are band directors at schools or have been or uh you know there some people that are actually music majors They dont necessarily follow that any more you know that isnt necessarily their career but uh we have some extremely good talent in there and uh as rule it sounds pretty decent so - Its fun
turns.label: aa

turns.text: I I have absolutely no musical ability whatsoever and Im always very envious of people who do
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well I dont know if I have any or not I Ive always enjoyed it I sing in church choir on Wednesday nights when Im around and play in the band on Monday nights and keeps you out of trouble that way
